hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a solitary #Cow#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #temporal stone within the Deku Tree# contains #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ After Spinning Log Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Blue Potion Bottle# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Minuet of Forest#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Light Trial Lullaby Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that Lon Lon Ranch prospered under Ingo.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that quest guidance can be found at a talking rock.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Left Invisible Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Map Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree MQ Before Spinning Log Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #2# major items.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #5# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Fire Temple Compass#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Purple Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #the Song of Storms# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #1# major item.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #before the Truth Spinner gap# in the Shadow Temple locked chests contain...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple MQ Hover Boots Chest
